full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Winter Road Salt
#### Reference Number
WS4441195748-DOC4441238258

#### Proposals Closing Date
The deadline for proposals is **March 13, 2024, at 14:00 EST**.

#### Brief Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for a Regional Standing Offer (RSO) to deliver road salt to the Military Logistic Services (MLS) Base Transport, located at CFB Borden, Ontario. The RSO will be used for winter de-icing applications.

#### Standing Offer Period
The standing offer period will be for **one (1) year**, with options to extend for **two (2) additional one-year periods**.

#### Streams
Requests for proposals will be accepted under two streams:

*   **Stream 1**: Supply and delivery of winter road salt (RISO one)
*   **Stream 2**: Supply and delivery of winter road salt (procurement strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) Set Aside RISO one)

The Stream 2 procurement has been set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). Suppliers must certify that they are Indigenous businesses as defined by PSIB and will comply with all requirements.

#### Selection Criteria
The proposals will be evaluated based on the **Lowest Price** criterion.

#### Trade Agreements
Tenders are open to suppliers who are qualified under the Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact
For more information, please contact Ms. Vashti Ramnarine at [vashti.ramnarine@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:vashti.ramnarine@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca) or 289-772-7284.
